statements: DELETE FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
DELETE FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 123 AND purchase_history LIKE '%return%'
DELETE FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM purchase_details WHERE quantity < 5)
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 1 AND date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 123 AND purchase_history->>'total_spent' > '1000.00';
DELETE FROM orders WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE full_name LIKE 'John Doe%');
DELETE FROM products WHERE price < (SELECT AVG(price) FROM products);
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 100 AND product_name = 'Laptop';
DELETE FROM addresses WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';
